response.original_title: The Actor's Curse: A Tale of Twisted Fate
response.overview: The Actor's Curse: A Tale of Twisted Fate A washed-up actor discovers a mysterious journal that brings his bitter revenge fantasies to life. As he writes macabre tales targeting those he blames for his downfall, each story manifests in horrifying reality. But his triumph turns to terror when the journal's dark power threatens to consume him. From the creators of Unearthed, this is where vengeance meets its price.
response.title: The Actor's Curse: A Tale of Twisted Fate
